title: 353F.052 APPLICATION OF SURVIVING SPOUSE, DEPENDENT CHILD PROVISION.
text: Notwithstanding any provisions of law to the contrary, subdivisions within section 353.32 of the edition of Minnesota Statutes published in the year before the year in which a privatization occurred, applicable to the surviving spouse or dependent children of a former member as defined in section 353.01, subdivision 7a, apply to the survivors of a privatized former public employee.
